features.title: Initialize Frontend Web Application
features.description: Initialize a modern frontend web application in the frontend/ directory with proper project structure, build tooling, and foundational components

features.title: Enhanced GitHub Workflow for Frontend Application
Automated Git Workflow for Feature Command
Automated Issue Creation for Failed Workflow Jobs

implementations.description: Fix JSX syntax error in App.tsx - BrowserRouter tag mismatch
Fix TypeScript build error - BrowserRouter JSX tag typo
Fix TypeScript build error - Box component JSX tag typo (Boxees)
Fix JSX parsing error - Box component JSX tag typo (Boxsas)

features.title: Dark Mode and Light Mode Theme Toggle
features.description: Provide users with the ability to switch between dark and light visual themes to suit their preferences and viewing conditions, with theme preference persistence across sessions

implementations.description: Fix ESLint errors in dark mode feature - duplicate imports, formatting, and type safety

features.title: Initialize Backend API
features.description: Initialize a backend API system in the backend/ directory with proper project structure, server capabilities, data persistence mechanisms, authentication systems, and deployment configurations

implementations.description: Fix CI/CD dependency conflict between flake8>=7.0 and flake8-django 1.4
Verify Security Audit workflow success after flake8-django removal (same root cause as #146)
Fix CI/CD pipeline failures - syntax error in authentication code, missing SECRET_KEY configuration, and test collection errors
Fix Frontend CI/CD failures - JSX syntax error in App.tsx (BrowserRoutewr typo)
Fix Backend CI/CD failures - mypy type errors, Black formatting issues, and missing startup script tests
Fix Backend CI/CD dependency resolution failure - django-stubs and djangorestframework-stubs version conflicts
Fix Backend CI/CD failures - test framework configuration error (426 tests blocked), code quality violations (50+ linting issues), and missing type annotations (53 type errors)
Fix Backend CI/CD pipeline failures - 174 test failures (database, authentication, security), code formatting violations (Black), and type checking errors (47 mypy errors)
Fix Backend CI/CD pipeline failures - mypy type checking errors and test suite failures
Fix Backend CI/CD pipeline failures - type checking error in user serializer and API documentation test failures
Fix Backend CI/CD test failures - database configuration (PostgreSQL vs SQLite), test data seeding, rate limiting, and management command issues (29 test failures)
Fix Backend CI/CD test failures - configuration validation, database connection testing, example test patterns, and management command output (11 test failures)
Fix Backend CI/CD test failures - database connection closure/reopening and test database name configuration (2 test failures)
Fix Backend CI/CD test failure - database connection lifecycle management (1 test failure) and deprecation warnings cleanup (313 warnings)
Fix Backend CI/CD build failure - missing log directory preventing application initialization
Fix Backend CI/CD build failure - unconditional import of development-only debug_toolbar package in production

features.title: Application Containerization with Docker
features.description: Package frontend and backend applications into containerized environments that work consistently across local development, staging, and production deployments, with centralized configuration and secrets management for each application

features.title: Container Build and Validation in CI/CD Pipelines
features.description: Validate containerized deployment artifacts in CI/CD workflows through automated container building, functional testing, security scanning, image optimization checks, layer caching, and container registry integration with proper version tagging

implementations.description: Fix Frontend CI/CD failures - ESLint console logging violations and missing test environment variables
Fix Backend CI/CD container startup validation failure - production container requires database connectivity during initialization
Fix Frontend CI/CD security scan upload failures - GitHub Actions permissions for SARIF upload to Security tab
Fix Backend CI/CD container startup validation failure - missing static files directory configuration
Fix Frontend CI/CD linting failures - Prettier formatting errors and console statement violations in production code
Fix Backend CI/CD container startup validation failure - API documentation configuration issue for frontend config endpoint
Fix Frontend CI/CD security scan failures - GitHub Security upload permissions and production container vulnerability threshold exceeded
Fix Backend CI/CD container functional test failure - workflow step ordering causes API tests to run before health check verification completes
Fix Frontend CI/CD image verification failure - tag mismatch between build (staging-) and verification (prod-) steps
Fix Backend CI/CD health endpoint test failure - API test runs before server is fully ready, needs retry logic
Fix Backend CI/CD health endpoint returning HTTP 301 redirect instead of HTTP 200 success
Fix Docker tag generation for feature branches - branch names with slashes create invalid Docker tags

features.title: Frontend-Backend Integration Test Page
features.description: Enable users to verify that the frontend application can successfully communicate with the backend application through a dedicated test page that demonstrates API connectivity and data exchange

implementations.description: Fix TypeScript compilation errors - type import syntax violation and syntax compatibility issues
Fix ESLint code quality violation - duplicate import statements in API test page

features.title: Onboarding & Assessment
features.description: Enable new users to quickly set up their profile by collecting essential information (age, sport, level, training days, injury history, and equipment) through a simple intake form, allowing the system to generate personalized training programs tailored to their needs

implementations.description: Fix Backend CI/CD failures - mypy type annotation errors in assessment models and views, API documentation generation issues preventing container startup
Fix Frontend CI/CD failures - Prettier formatting errors and duplicate import statements in assessment components

features.title: Unified Multi-Service Orchestration
features.description: Enable developers and operators to deploy and run the complete application stack (frontend, backend, database, web server, and reverse proxy) as a unified system in any environment (local development, staging, production) using a single orchestration configuration that manages service dependencies, networking, and environment-specific settings

features.title: End-to-End Testing Suite
features.description: Enable developers and quality assurance teams to verify that the complete application stack (frontend, backend, database integration) works correctly through automated end-to-end tests that validate user workflows, API contracts, visual consistency, and performance requirements in a dedicated testing environment

implementations.description: Fix Backend Test Database Connectivity - CI/CD pipeline backend tests failing with database connection refused errors
Fix CI/CD Pipeline failures - Django test settings module configuration and Docker cache optimization
Fix CI/CD Pipeline failures - Database connection pooling configuration and frontend API URL default settings
Fix test isolation - database connection pooling disabled in test environment (CONN_MAX_AGE configuration)
Fix CI/CD Pipeline test failures - database connection pooling configuration (5 related test failures)
Fix CI/CD Pipeline Failed - Missing NPM script configuration in workflow (test:unit vs test:run)
Fix CI/CD Pipeline Failed - Missing test directory mount in Docker container configuration
Fix Frontend CI/CD test failure - validateApiUrl function not rejecting empty strings
Fix Backend CI/CD code quality failures - Black code formatter violations in 3 test files
Fix Frontend CI/CD linting failure - ESLint configuration file discovery blocked by overly broad ignore patterns
Fix Frontend CI/CD linting failure - ESLint v9 configuration file discovery issue preventing linting execution

features.title: Make Onboarding Page the Main Page
features.description: Enable new and returning users to immediately access the onboarding and assessment experience when they visit the application's root URL, making profile setup and training program configuration the primary entry point for the application

implementations.description: Fix Frontend CI/CD linting failures - Prettier formatting errors and unused variable violations in test files

features.title: Phase 1: Consolidate Docker Compose Files
features.description: Enable developers and operators to manage container orchestration through a simplified, non-redundant configuration structure by eliminating duplicate compose files across the repository while maintaining full functionality for all deployment environments (local, staging, production, testing)

implementations.description: Fix Frontend Configuration API URL Port Issue - configuration endpoint returning incomplete URL without port number
Fix CI/CD Pipeline Failed - Code quality line length violation in configuration views

features.title: Application Version Management
features.description: Enable developers and operators to track application versions across frontend and backend components using semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH format), with version information stored in standard package management files and automatically integrated into Docker build processes and CI/CD workflows to control build cache invalidation and enable version-aware deployments

features.title: Logging Guidelines & Standards
features.description: Create comprehensive logging guidelines that define what to log, what to omit, and how to structure implementation logs for optimal value-to-noise ratio

features.title: Command Logging Updates
features.description: Update the /implement command to enforce new logging standards and reduce verbosity in implementation logs by 50-65%

features.title: Equipment Assessment Single Selection with Conditional Follow-up
features.description: Enable users to accurately specify their available training equipment through a single-selection equipment assessment with conditional follow-up prompts for basic equipment, allowing users to indicate specific equipment items from predefined options or custom entries

implementations.description: Fix CI/CD Pipeline failures - startup scripts acceptance tests outdated (16 failures), equipment migration details tracking, and frontend config test expectations mismatch
